ingredients: +   3/4 cup all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 cup milk,   +   1/2 cup water, 3  eggs, 3 tablespoons butter, melted,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1   +   1/4 cups sifted confectioners' sugar, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 teaspoon lemon zest,   +   1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup heavy cream, whipped, 4 cups sliced strawberries
